item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: PingCAP Privacy Statement Effective: June 1, 2020 Beijing PingCAP Xingchen Technology and Development Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred as “PingCAP”, PingCAP and its affiliates hereinafter referred as “PingCAP Group”，” “we,” “our,” or “us”) understand that privacy is important to visitors to our websites (our “Sites”) and users of our products and services (our “Products”). This Privacy Statement explains how we collect, use, and share your personal information when you use the Sites and Products that link to this Privacy Statement.
